snippet.title: Mini City: Mayhem - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the Mini City: Mayhem trailer for the upcoming cozy city-builder game. The trailer for Mini City: Mayhem shows gameplay and 5 different game modes, including Mayhem, Zen, Square Stack, Crane, and Sandbox. Mini City: Mayhem will be available on Steam on February 17, 2025.

As the freshly elected mayor of a town, it is your job to turn a little plot of land into a bustling metropolis. Manage your resources, lay the foundation for important hubs for your expanding city, and watch as your population grows. However, every second counts in Mini City: Mayhem, so there's no time to relax and take pride in your work.

#Gaming #Games #Trailer
